languages.text: "Если Император будет благоволить нам, вывернем наизнанку и остальные части ксеносского скомороха".
languages.translation_comment:
Discussing the Solitaire's appearance.
Cassia: "This colourful xenos... has hues different to those of its kin. It is as if they have been... turned inside out and upside down."

traits.locale_text: "Если Император будет благоволить нам, вывернем наизнанку и остальные части ксеносского скомороха".

languages.text: "Emperor willing, we'll turn every other part of that xenos buffoon inside out as well."
languages.translation_comment:
Discussing the Solitaire's appearance.
Cassia: "This colourful xenos... has hues different to those of its kin. It is as if they have been... turned inside out and upside down."
languages.original_text: "Если Император будет благоволить нам, вывернем наизнанку и остальные части ксеносского скомороха".

traits.locale_text: "Emperor willing, we'll turn every other part of that xenos buffoon inside out as well."
"Emperor willing, we'll turn every other part of that xenos buffoon inside out as well."

"Emperor willing, we'll turn every other part of that xenos buffoon inside out as well."

languages.text: 「皇帝陛下の御意志があれば、あの異種族の道化の体も、残らずひっくり返してやりますね」
languages.original_text: "Emperor willing, we'll turn every other part of that xenos buffoon inside out as well."

traits.locale_text: 「皇帝陛下の御意志があれば、あの異種族の道化の体も、残らずひっくり返してやりますね」

languages.text: "So der Imperator will, werden wir auch noch sämtliche anderen Teile dieses dummen Xenos nach außen stülpen."
languages.original_text: "Emperor willing, we'll turn every other part of that xenos buffoon inside out as well."

traits.locale_text: "So der Imperator will, werden wir auch noch sämtliche anderen Teile dieses dummen Xenos nach außen stülpen."

languages.text: « Si l'Empereur le veut, vous ne verrez plus que du rouge quand nous en aurons fini avec lui. »
languages.original_text: "Emperor willing, we'll turn every other part of that xenos buffoon inside out as well."

traits.locale_text: « Si l'Empereur le veut, vous ne verrez plus que du rouge quand nous en aurons fini avec lui. »

languages.text: «Emperador mediante, también le daremos la vuelta a las demás partes de ese bufón xenos».
languages.original_text: "Emperor willing, we'll turn every other part of that xenos buffoon inside out as well."

traits.locale_text: «Emperador mediante, también le daremos la vuelta a las demás partes de ese bufón xenos».

languages.text: “帝皇在上，我们也可以把那个异形小丑别的地方从里到外翻个底朝天。”
languages.original_text: "Emperor willing, we'll turn every other part of that xenos buffoon inside out as well."

traits.locale_text: “帝皇在上，我们也可以把那个异形小丑别的地方从里到外翻个底朝天。”

languages.text: "İmparator izin verirse bu zeno süprüntülerinin tamamının içini dışına çıkaracağız."
languages.original_text: "Emperor willing, we'll turn every other part of that xenos buffoon inside out as well."

traits.locale_text: "İmparator izin verirse bu zeno süprüntülerinin tamamının içini dışına çıkaracağız."

languages.original_text: "Emperor willing, we'll turn every other part of that xenos buffoon inside out as well."
